title: Luxury House for Sale in Nawala
details:
Meticulously maintained luxury house conveniently located only 100 meters away from the Nawala Road, within close proximity to all modern day conveniences. The house offers extensive living space along with five bedrooms and five bathrooms. Features include a spacious living & dining area, cinema room, separate pantry and wet kitchen, rooftop terrace and landscaped garden.

The master bedroom sits on the 1st floor, thoughtfully designed with a walk-in closet along with a spacious master bathroom and outdoor Jacuzzi. A well configured, beautifully designed family house in a quiet residential neighborhood.

- Five spacious bedrooms. Three bedrooms equipped with A/C.
- Five bathrooms equipped with solar powered hot water.
- Separate pantry and wet kitchen both equipped with fitted cupboards.
- Cinema room equipped with A/C.
- Landscaped garden & outdoor veranda.
- Rooftop terrace with garden.
- Separate maids and drivers quarters.
- Electric roller garage door with two covered parking spaces.
- Security system, CCTV system, three phase electricity with provision for generator.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
